comments.serverId: (str) the id of the discord server
comments.serverName: (str) the name of the discord server
comments.adminRole: (str) the id of the admin role

alert.open: (str) the msg used when a server is opened
alert.close: (str) the msg used when a server is closed (use is dependant on closeAlert setting)

embed.useEmbed: (boolean) whether to use embeds or just text

open.title: (str) title of the embed
open.description: (str) the msg used when a server is opened
open.color: (str) the color of the side bar of the embed in hexidecimal format

close.title: (str) title of the embed
close.description: (str) the msg used when a server is closed (use is dependant on closeAlert setting)
close.color: (str) the color of the side bar of the embed in hexidecimal format

players.enabled: (boolean) whether or not to show this button
players.color: (str) the color used based on discords weird standard, there are only 4 colors
players.explanation: sends the user who clicked a message with what players are on the server (is ephemeral so only they can see the msg)

modlist.enabled: (boolean) whether or not to show this button
modlist.color: (str) the color used based on Discord's weird standard, there are only 4 colors
modlist.explanation: sends the user who clicked a message with what mods the server has (is ephemeral so only they can see the msg)

comments.closeAlert: (str) how should alerts be handled when the server closes, (nothing, edit, delete, closeAlert), check docs for more info
comments.filters: (object[tags (list/array), name (list/array), description (list/array), mod (list/array)]) the filters used to figure out if an alert should be sent, there are 4 kinds of filters, tags, name ,description, mod, check docs for more info
comments.channels: (list/array) the channels used to send alerts
